DOC.brief_summary: The stapled transanal rectal resection ( STARR procedure ) effective treatment obstruct defecation syndrome ( ODS ) cause intussusception rectocele . Recently new technique develop use new Contour® TranstarTM stapler , specifically design facilitate STARR procedure . The investigator would like evaluate morbidity quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Stapled TransAnal Rectal Resection ( STARR ) With Contour® TranstarTM
DOC.criteria: Rectocele Intussusception Non operability inflammatory bowel disease
